00026 // lbann_data_reader_imagenet .hpp .cpp - DataReader class for ImageNet dataset
00028 
00029 #ifndef LBANN_DATA_READER_IMAGENET_HPP
00030 #define LBANN_DATA_READER_IMAGENET_HPP
00031 
00032 #include "lbann_data_reader.hpp"
00033 
00034 namespace lbann
00035 {
00036         class DataReader_ImageNet : public DataReader
00037         {
00038         public:
00039     DataReader_ImageNet(int batchSize, bool shuffle);
00040     DataReader_ImageNet(int batchSize);
00041     DataReader_ImageNet(const DataReader_ImageNet& source);
00042                 ~DataReader_ImageNet();
00043 
00044     int fetch_data(Mat& X);
00045     int fetch_label(Mat& Y);
00046                 int get_num_labels() { return m_num_labels; }
00047 
00048                 // ImageNet specific functions
00049     //          bool load(std::string FileDir, std::string ImageFile, std::string LabelFile);
00050     bool load(std::string imageDir, std::string imageListFile);
00051     bool load(std::string imageDir, std::string imageListFile, size_t max_sample_count, bool firstN=false);
00052     bool load(std::string imageDir, std::string imageListFile, double validation_percent, bool firstN=false);
00053     void free();
00054 
00055                 int get_image_width() { return m_image_width; }
00056                 int get_image_height() { return m_image_height; }
00057     int get_linearized_data_size() { return m_image_width * m_image_height; }
00058     int get_linearized_label_size() { return m_num_labels; }
00059 
00060     DataReader_ImageNet& operator=(const DataReader_ImageNet& source);
00061 
00062         private:
00063                 std::string                                                     m_image_dir; // where images are stored
00064                 std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int> >       ImageList; // list of image files and labels
00065                 int                                                                             m_image_width; // image width (256)
00066                 int                                                                             m_image_height; // image height (256)
00067                 int                                                                                     m_num_labels; // # labels (1000)
00068     unsigned char *         m_pixels;
00069         };
00070 }
